Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

client_cache_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output), getLastId (nwState net h) client = Some (id, out) -> output_correct client id out (rev (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments client_cache_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_inter

Record state_machine_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_correct_interface { state_machine_correct_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_correct net } Arguments state_machine_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

init_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) => mkRaft_data 0 None None [] 0 0 init [] [] false [] Follower [] [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data Arguments init_handlers {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

raft_net_invariant_reboot' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> (forall h' : Net.name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```coq
intros net Hnet.
apply state_machine_correct_invariant with (orig_base_params:=orig_base_params) (one_node_params:=one_node_params) (raft_params:=raft_params) in Hnet.
destruct Hnet as [Hlog Hcache Hcomplete].
apply Hcache.
Qed.
